scripts.dev:esm: npx json -I -f package.json -e "this.type='module'" && npm run clean && npx tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && node dist/index.js
scripts.dev:cjs: npx json -I -f package.json -e "this.type='commonjs'" && npm run clean && npx tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && node dist/index.js
scripts.dev:node: npx json -I -f package.json -e "this.type='commonjs'" && npm run clean && node index.js
